participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, introspective, and passionate about her hobbies.
participant_1.background: I enjoy doing beadwork and writing my own patterns. I just moved from va to pa. Since I have fibromyalgia, the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me. I grew up on a large farm. I love reading.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, social, and loves spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I drive an suv. I have 3 dogs. I have a vacation home in the mountains. I have a law degree.

content.text: Hello! I'm user 1.
Hi, I'm user 2.
Nice to meet you. Where are you from?
I'm from Philadelphia.
Oh, me too! I just moved here from Virginia.
Oh, wow! How do you like it so far?
It's a lot different, but I'm getting used to it.
I'm sure you will. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, beadwork, and go hiking.
Oh, I like to read too! What are you reading now?
I'm reading a book about the history of Pennsylvania.
That sounds interesting. I've never been much of a history buff.
I guess it's not for everyone. What do you do for fun?
I like to go camping, hiking, and playing with my dogs.
Oh, I love camping! I used to go camping a lot when I was younger.
We have a vacation home in the mountains, so we go camping a lot in the summer.
That sounds amazing! I've never been to the mountains.
You should come visit us sometime! We'd love to have you.
I'd love to!
Great! We'll have to plan a trip sometime.
